description: Over last few years Microsoft has undergone significant transformation into a truly data-driven enterprise. It required a lot of effort and tools that were built mostly with an internal audience in mind. Now it is time to share our experiences with the wider community. Let's start with very unsexy, yet necessary task - making your models run happily as part of larger IT infrastructure.
title: #11 PyData - Michał Żyliński (Microsoft)  - From process to production
